On 8/4/10 7:30 PM, HyuuGaBaDita wrote:
> Hi Gordon! It's glad to hear from you! thanks for your reply!U're
> indeed vry helpful!
>
> 1.Now that I can remember my login credentials. But can I remove the
> login page and directly go into the heritrix mainpage?

If you are visiting from the same browser without having quit and 
relaunched the browser, you won't be prompted again. In most browsers, 
even with a quit and relaunch, the values can be saved so you won't have 
to re-type.

Why do you need to eliminate even that step? (Is there something else 
you're trying to achieve?)

You should also review this page about why it is important to limit 
access to the administrative interface:

https://webarchive.jira.com/wiki/display/Heritrix/Security+Considerations

> 2.Thanks for the depthe level setting advice ! It works!!!! and I am
> gald abt it! Thanks!
>
> 3. I still don't understand how to download more than a website at
> the same time. Is it I just type in all the url addresses in the
> seeds textbox, line by line then add in once again all the url
> addresss in the http-header-user agent text box by adding "+" sign.
> For example: seeds text box: http://www.abc.com http://www.def.com
>
> http-header-user agent text box: Mozilla/5.0 (compatible;
> heritrix/1.14.3 +http://www.abc.com +http://www.def.com)

You should not be putting the URLs of the sites you're crawling into the 
'http-user-agent' value!

The HTTP 'User-Agent' header is to identify *you* to sites, allowing 
them to contact you if anything goes wrong. The URL should be an URL 
that describes your purpose in crawling and includes contact information 
such as an email address or phone number.

This is covered in the H1 User Manual, among other places:

http://crawler.archive.org/articles/user_manual/config.html#httpheaders

> 4.Why is it after we key in the url in the seed box then we need to
> re-keyin the url once agin into the http-header-user agent text box
> and somemore we need to provide our email add in the "from" texbox?
> It seems like doing double work. Can we simplify this? Is there any
> easier way on this?

See above.

> 5.I facing the remote access problem. I installed my heritrix in a
> PC, then when I using my laptop to remote access it to the PC, the
> heritrix show blank page.

See the User Manual, especially the 'Note' under here:

http://crawler.archive.org/articles/user_manual/install.html#N1008F

> Please help me and guide me.

You should do a front-to-back read of the User Manual, review the 
project wiki, and follow/search others' questions in this discussion 
list -- as these questions already have written answers in many places.

- Gordon @ IA
